Nightstrike/Darkfate:
> �Yes sir� said Nightstrike and both males followed
>Decibel


Decibel leads Nightstrike and Darkfate a few hundred yards inward to
the highest peak on the mountain top. As they walk Tumult has been
speaking into his radio, his voice much too low to be understood.

Before long they came out into a clearing, and before them stands a
female minion looking at some device and a much larger mech that could
only be Deepstryke.

The female is predominantly crimson red with ebony black at her
shoulders and hips. She is obviously a jet in her alt mode, as her
slender midriff bore the distinctive outline of a nosecone. Her face
and forearms are alabaster white, with fin like protrusions of the same
hue flowing off of her helm.

She looked up at the duo as they entered, locking gazes with
Nightstrike and Darkfate. Her demeanor was curious and yet strangely
aggressive, her humorless smile she displayed only accentuated this.
Her optics were deep and penetrating as she stared at them, her head
tilting slightly. For a moment it was as if she saw not just them, but
something more, something only she could see about them. But then the
moment passed as her smile faded and she returned to looking at the
device she had been studying before they came up.

The other figure that stood here was truly massive. He stood nearly
head and shoulders taller then most mechs, with huge shoulders, and
powerful limbs. He was colored primarily in gunmetal grey armor, with
red at his large shoulders, and splashes of it at his faceplate. He
looked something like a seeker on steroids! He had what appeared to be
a nosecone at his chest, but his frame was far more thickly armored
then any seeker. Cannons were mounted on his back, as well extending
from his shoulders extending along each bicep, while on his chest
appeared to be rocket or missile launchers.

He turned to look at the female next to him, his face dour and hard,
�Phobia, you have the information yet?�

The red and black femme next to him snapped alert and looked over, �Yes
sir, I have something.� She glanced back at her device and then back at
Deepstryke, �It has taken some time to make sense of the neural upload
Nightrazor sent us of Hot Rod, but I do believe we have a location of
what they're looking for.�

Deepstryke nodded, �Does it match the original location Cyclonus sent
us?� 

Phobia nodded as Deepstryke's head snapped around to look at 
Nightstrike and darkfate, his look long and penatrating, �What do you
know of the original Ark the fell to earth, and of the Optimus Prime
that held the matrix?�

Preston
(Da'minion)
